name: Bali Safari and Marine Park
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra No.Km. 19, Serongga, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80551, Indonesia
review 1:
We had the most amazing time at the Night Safari. We received a yummy welcome drink once we arrived inside the Park and then we were taken on a little walking tour before we headed to dinner. With the Dinner you had a choice to sit inside or out. We chose inside as we could sit and watch the lions through the glass which was beautiful.  The food was the same no matter were you chose to sit and it was a yummy buffet. So many choices and it was really nice. We loved the food. We loved the fire dance and our 8 year old son was just mesmerised but it. The best part of course was being put in a cage on the back of the truck and having lions jump up on the side and tigers jump on top of the cage. We got to feed elephants, zebras,  cows, camels and we saw Giraffes and rings as well. It was AMAZING. So woth the price. I would suggest booking online before you go so you don't drive all that way and find out they are fully booked the day we went they booked out. Book online the. Hire a driver to take you there and back.
The staff are amazing and so helpful.
review 2: The zoo is really spacious, and the staff is super friendly. There are many animals to see. I expected to see African elephants, but sadly, they weren't there. The place is very well-maintained and clean for a zoo, though there are some smells from the animals. Unfortunately, all the food and drinks are very expensive. I spent a lot of money just on ice cream (I came with my best friend), and the total cost was more than the entrance ticket üò≠
review 3: Highly recommend visiting this safari and paying extra for the private jeep through the park. You get to feed the animals from the car and get incredibly close  to some of the animals. The shows are also well presented; showing how some animals are facing extinction in Indonesia.
review 4:
Had such a great time here!

We took the private experience 4x4 jeep to feed the animals for 1M Rp, so worth it - highly recommend!!

thereafter we went for the tiger presentation with a very interesting concept.

We ended our day with feeding the meerkats and hanging out with the parrots.

What an amazing day!
review 5:
Bali Safari is an incredible zoo experience that goes beyond expectations. Set in the lush landscapes of Bali, it's more than just a typical zoo‚Äîit's a wildlife adventure. From the moment you step in, you're transported into different habitats, where you can observe majestic animals roaming freely in environments that mimic their natural habitats. The variety of species is astounding, from big cats to exotic birds, elephants, and more.

What sets Bali Safari apart is its commitment to conservation and education. You can engage in various interactive experiences, like feeding giraffes or getting up close with baby animals, all while learning about their behaviors and conservation efforts. The safari journey itself is a highlight, where you embark on a thrilling ride through different zones, encountering animals from around the world.

The facilities are top-notch, with spacious enclosures that prioritize the animals' welfare while providing visitors with excellent viewing opportunities. There are also dining options within the park, allowing you to refuel while enjoying stunning views of the wildlife.

Overall, Bali Safari offers an unforgettable experience for animal lovers of all ages. It's a place where you can immerse yourself in the beauty of nature, learn about conservation, and create lasting memories with family and friends. If you're visiting Bali, don't miss the chance to embark on this extraordinary safari adventure.

name: Mara River Safari Lodge
address: Bali Safari and Marine Park, Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra No.Km. 19, Serongga, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80551, Indonesia
review 1:
Our zoo experience was wonderful. We thoroughly enjoyed the whole thing, apart from the dinner. Everything that was on the buffet was cold, not just lukewarm but cold.
The buffet breakfast was a bit better, but still a lot of cold food, that should be hot.
Well worth the stay there to experience the magic of the place, but don‚Äôt expect much of the food.
review 2: Amazing!!!! We absolutely loved out stay here!! The zoo was wonderful, restaurant/service/food is first class. The accommodation is beautiful. Cocktails in the pool, night safaris, and dinner + shows right by the lions - everything was wonderful. The staff are so helpful with absolutely everything, and the transport by golf cart from rooms to the lodge was very convenient. The family room is so spacious, perfect for relaxing between adventures. We can't wait to go back!!
review 3:
It was great experience, kids will love it. Amazing service and lot to explore.

Just a feedback to management to change timings of water play zone as its from 10:30 to 17:00 however check in time is 14:00 and checkout is 12:00 so we do not get time to explore water play zone with all other activities across the property, also the lady receptionist is bit rude all other staff were exceptionally good. I would really like to visit again.
review 4: We enjoyed our family vacation at Mara River Safari Resort. The staff were hospitable, and the lion view during breakfast was a special touch. The jungle safari was exciting, and feeding zebras from our room was a unique highlight. The room could have been cooler, but overall, it was a great experience!
review 5: Great experience for families.safari was fantastic and the kids loved the shows and petting zoo! Worth mentioning Mardita at the front was fantastic and always very helpful which made our stay even more pleasant. Food at restaurants were all good! Service great. The rooms are avg, but you're visiting for what else this place has to offer. Will def  be a memorable trip üëç

name: safari Bali
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra No.8, Medahan, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: The staff are scammers. They allowed my friends entry without checking ID and when it came to me they wouldn‚Äôt give me entry without ID even though I had just purchased the ticket. The staff were also apparently very rude to my friends inside the park: all refused to help her take a photo. Be careful if you buy the ticket online and make any spelling mistake with the name or if you don‚Äôt bring current ID they don‚Äôt allow you to enter and they won‚Äôt refund you either. Customer service was very unhelpful. The man at information center desk was rude, picking his nose with his finger right up inside Is nose and laughing at me. They said there is no on duty manager and wouldn‚Äôt give a management contact. Pretty much they just steal the money. Bad management, seems to be underpaid staff who are unhappy and scamming paying customers. Avoid this park. Awful experience and I paid for the driver and tickets.
review 2: We had wonderful experience at this theme based hotel. Rooms were spacious and beautifully decorated. Pool area is good. Their restaurant provides lot of good food options.
review 3: NOT A SAFARI. It's a zoo, a decent one. Some close encounters with animals in very small enclosures (some via a rushed bus ride, which I guess makes them call it a "safari"). Nice restaurants (one where you can eat next to lions), almost no air-conditioned places to rest or eat (other than lion restaurant). Western prices for most things, (e.g. 400k for some mains). Not sure if the value for money is there, but the shattered promise of a Safari was enough to make me feel scammed. It's an average zoo, like most zoos in major cities around the world, only much more expensive than any other activity in Bali. Go there only if your expectations are of a standard zoo.
review 4: We‚Äôll worth the money. Great time. Up close encounters with wide range of animals
review 5: The place is well designed, lots of shade and wonderful shows. My kids enjoyed it very much!

name: Tsavo Lion Restaurant
address: Serongga, Gianyar, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80515, Indonesia
review 1: Great restaurant with lion and meerkat by the window. We visited after lunch hours and got fried rice set of 4 which was reasonably priced. Portion was good but took a while to come out.
review 2:
Breakfast spread was okay but the crossiant were soft. You can hear the lion roar for real.

The toilet has a window for you to see the lions, too. At night, you can amuse yourself looking at people trapped in cage, feeding the lions.
review 3: Very nice place to get lunch and dinner! All the staff super friendly and the food is amazing!
review 4: Pathetic food and portion size. Instant mash potatoes, worlds smallest chicken breast. If you are a foodie avoid at all cost.
review 5:
Just awesome üëèüèªü§© this experience is worth to try. Whether you are the hotel guest, safari visitor or you just wanna try any meal with lions. Also there are different meal packages with giraffes and African animals. All worth to try.
We were the hotel guest and our hotel reservation included breakfast so we tried the breakfast with lions, the buffet was completeüëåüèº we tried lunch and also in the evening we tried the bar and dinner and again it was good. Not only you can see the lions but also when safari tours come to the lions you can watch others experience and encounter with lion feedings,
I highly suggest both the quality of food and also the experience with lions.

name: Rangkung Hill Villa Gianyar by The Lavana
address: Jl. Carik Sekalangan, Br. Lebih Beten Kelod, Lebih, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80515, Indonesia
review 1: The place is good and quite relaxing.  There are lots of photo spots for having selfie.  The menu is delicious and the price is not too expensive.  But the weak of this place is that the service is quite not good.  The waiters and waitress are too long in serving the foods and beverage. Over all it's good.
review 2:
This place is surrounded by rice field, Green scenery everywhere, close to a beach, you can hear wave from your room. Bed is so comfy with spacious bathroom.

The food at the restaurant are delicious and affordable.

They also have outbond yard and camping ground. Good spots to take selfies.
review 3: Nice place to visit, for event gathering or picnic. There are two swimming pool (for children about 75 cm depth and for adult about 150 cm depth),  you can swim wherever you want with pay IDR 10.000 more.
review 4: Was randomly looking another good spots through by pas Ida bagus mantra gianyar and find this place. Was came in weekdays and almost no one . They have simple cooked food but it was good. Great for family picnic , entrance was 10k per person.
review 5: Rangkung Hill is located at By Pass Ida Bagus Mantra after Bali Safari & Marine Park if we come from Sanur. The place are not really far from the main road. Nobody will wonder that there's a place in the middle of residential area. The Rp.10.000,-/pax for the ticket is interesting. They have rice field, restaurant with beanbags chair & gazebo, flying fox and others, the scary bridge, until photo spots that instagramable. The foods are good but the dessert is not really recomended. Bc the price and the portion is not make sense. But over all we enjoy this place. The local people usually come after 4p.m. They use it for dinner place. And the important is staffs are so friendly.

name: VARUNA Bali
address: Jl. Profesor Doktor Ida Bagus Mantra, Km.19,8, Serongga, Gianyar, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80551, Indonesia
review 1: The show was amazing, never seen a show like this in Indonesia! Beautiful choreography and amazing artists! The gate open at 12:30, you can have lunch with music entertainment and the show will start by 13:30. Recommended!
review 2: This is the highlight of the Safari, in my opinion. The stage performance is beautifully executed by multiple artists. Animals are proactively involved as well, including birds.
review 3:
Great place, great show, great food.
The people were really nice and friendly.
It is new but really something  that you don't want to miss. Thanks to Julian, who did look after us really well.
review 4: We truly adore this place and the show. The place was so instagramable and worth to take a lot pics from the water tunnel until the restaurant are so aestheticüòç. The staff that greet us in the lobby area was friendly and amazing they escorted us to go to the restaurant and the other staff there ALSOOO KIND they take care of us so wellüòç HAVE TO MENTION ABOUT THE AMAZING SHOW it was trulyyy magicaaaall and incredible. Definitely we will go back here and Thank youuu for making the unforgettable experience for usü•∞‚ù§Ô∏è
review 5:
Absolutely brilliant. Took us on another world. One of the best thing you show in Bali. The way they performed the whole act, AMAZING! The stage setting was of an international standards along with an amazing background sound and colorful lighting making the show a spectacular one. Choreography, use of props, even performing with animal. Everything was top class. Sharing some of the landscape pictures I took during the show.

Visited in March '20, Before Lockdown.

name: Varuna Underwater Theatrical Dining
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra No.Km. 19, Serongga, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80551, Indonesia
review 1:
I went with my missus to Varuna for her birthday, book the premium package. We had a wonderful time and enjoyed just about everything about the whole experience.
The staff had a wonderful birthday surprise for my missus, the food was delicious and the show great.
If I would not book premium but only the regular, I am not sure if I would rate that positive.
The first 45 is just an acoustic combo on the stage, which is nice when you have the dining-experience there, but otherwise you just watch other people eat.

The Varuna Show itself is something like just under an hour and very entertaining. I would have wished for the aquarium to be included more, but it is still impressive.

I would have some more critics about what is included in the ticket-price, but that would not be Varuna related.

The PR department of Varuna needs to step up their game a little. We could not book in Kuta at any agent we asked and many people (tourists) we talked about the show didn‚Äôt even know it existed. ..
...and we were in a hotel, with guests middle and upper age, who can afford it, they were stunned by the pictures we showed them, and asked how to book.

We made a small video of our visit at Varuna, which gives a better impression than just pictures.

https://youtu.be/AQx42L_C3FQ?si=ZXt_XTS48bKCXfEk
review 2: Service is amazing. Ticket to show and meal does include access to the safari park so get here early around 10 to experience the animals as well . Kids fun park with water slides overall a great day out. There is a seperate menu if you don‚Äôt want the 3 course meal see photos. Show is spectacular.
review 3: The hospitality and service is outstanding. The opening band also very much entertaining and comfy our lunch. The show is another level of spectacular!  Kids love all the way in and out! Many thanks Bali Safari & Marine! You guys rocks!!
review 4: Absolutely incredible experience ü§© the welcome was so beautiful and attentive. We visited with 4 young children. The service was excellent, the food incredible and the atmosphere was another level amazing üòç definitely a MUST visit if you‚Äôre visiting Bali!
review 5: Amazing show, beautiful performance. The dancing, story , and contain good value. The food are tasty and world class. Happy to be here., very proud and happy. Thank you so much

name: Warung Kuda laut
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra No.888, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
What a weird place. The pool looked great, but turns out is only available for a few days at the end of each month, which isn't clear, no info anywhere and the front office lady seemed very unhappy to talk, really rarely you meet so unhelpful and unenthusiastic staff in Bali.
Menu changed a lot since the one uploaded here on google maps. Even though nasi goreng was ok and coconut - nicely carved and served cold, we left disappointed and wouldn't come back mostly because of the unfriendly atmosphere.
review 2: A quite comfortable place to chill out with views of the estuary river and mountains. The food is delicious and the price is still quite affordable. But unfortunately when we visited there, there were 2 events taking place at the same time and each one using its own music.
review 3:
location-10
food-10
view -10
coffee unfortunately -7
try guys nice friendly staff
review 4: Good river, pool, garden and sea shore view.

name: Secret Joglo Lebih
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra, Medahan, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 18007, Indonesia

name: Uma Restaurant
address: C88X+447, Medahan, Blahbatuh, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: The food is good and price is acceptable for the safari park. We ordered 2 cheeseburgers with caramelized onions with side salad and fries. The portion is not big but tasty and it costs around 200k IDR.
review 2: Top op then top off, why? To commit a visitor to a certain amount? Then no water for kids, or for refill, must buy bottle, even though the park claims 'sustainability' - translation: sustainable profits. Must first ask to speak with manager to gtlet water, because manager will not come. Then when the food comes, prepare to bite into a stone. And this is the better restaurant at the park. Better to go to Bali Zoo.
review 3:
We went there with kids ordered few drink before we order food. Few mins later we paid the staff who got our order came over to us and said payment was rejected even it was approved on our bank transaction. So we explained to the guy and he brought another staff who was very rude and ruin our day at the safari. She told us the transaction was cancelled. We showed her the history of transaction and she blamed us my husband took out the card before it showing transaction approved even we saw the transaction approved on the card machine. Also it was the staff who got our order and took out the card from the machine! She was staring at my husband and told him it is our fault.
She brought their manager and we had to explain again show them the transaction. We were too tired and kids were exhausted so we didn‚Äôt want argument. So we said we are just going to leave whether the transaction is gojng to be cancelled or not and said we didn‚Äôt want that drinks. The manager said the drinks are already made and the transaction will be cancelled, he said he is sure 90% for that and don‚Äôt write a bad review. Next day the transaction was cancelled. And I found out 2days later the transaction was made again even we didn‚Äôt have the drink. How can they cancel the transaction and make it again even it‚Äôs not their card?
Highly DO NOT recommend this place as the service of staffs and manager. They need to get well trained!
review 4: The food was actually nice, but the payment option was too much hassle.
review 5:
The food is amaaazzingg
I had a spaghetti bolognese and Thai green curry
Both are so tastyy...
The bolognese is the bessttt!!!

name: Capital O 3947 Akarsa Seahorses
address: Jl. Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra, Medahan, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Need to improve certain services such as water dispenser availability in each floor, universal plug for travellers, and get me a thicker blanket. Overall cleanliness still acceptable.
review 2: Nice hotel that you can find easily because of the location and big seahorse statue. The room was nice, but no amenities inside. They provide good meeting room, affordable price foods and you can decorate the garden for garden party as well. The view was nice.
review 3: Enjoying pool side and order spaghetti carbonara, first order was excellent food is good and presentation is best with that price, second order was amazing disaster, very poor presentation and salty. They need to be consistent for fb product other than that everything was good.
review 4: The location information must be updated,there is no cafe/public resto anymore,the place is change,become the yoga place/yoga community place.
review 5: I have stayed here for one night it was good but unfortunately they're not ready for the tools and equipment in the room such as spoon fork glasses but they do provide electric stove in the room.
